query.text: Call It What You Want Taylor Swift
query.displayText: Call It What You Want Taylor Swift

image.headLine: Call It What You Want is a song of American singer Taylor Swift, published on 3 November 2017 as a promotional single of his sixth studio album Reputation.
"Gorgeous" is a song recorded by American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift for her sixth studio album Reputation. It was released on October 20, 2017, as a promotional single from the album.
Researchers may have discovered that a series of volcanic eruptions, in addition to low Nile river waters, led to the toppling of the Ptolemaic empire.
Scientists in Australia are using genetic engineering to try and save the world's banana industry.
Archaeologists have uncovered the remains of a theater-like structure hidden beneath Jerusalem's Western Wall for 1,700 years.

query.text: Frat Brothers Dance For A Good Cause
query.displayText: Frat Brothers Dance For A Good Cause

image.headLine: The Sigma Tau Gamma brothers at University of Central Oklahoma have taken the Internet by storm with their impressive cheer and dance routine. Now, they're using the notoriety to raise money for The Special Olympics.
